38 using namespace Mutation::Utilities;
39 using namespace Eigen;

41 namespace Mutation {
42  namespace Transport {
43 
50 template <template <typename, int> class Solver>
51 class ThermalConductivityChapmannEnskog : public ThermalConductivityAlgorithm
52 {
53 public:
54  ThermalConductivityChapmannEnskog(ThermalConductivityAlgorithm::ARGS args) :
55  ThermalConductivityAlgorithm(args),
56  m_sys(MatrixXd::Zero(args.nHeavy(), args.nHeavy())),
57  m_x(args.nHeavy()),
58  m_alpha(args.nHeavy())
59  { }
60 
61  double thermalConductivity()
62  {
63  updateAlphas();
64  return m_x.matrix().dot(m_alpha);
65  }
66 
67  void thermalDiffusionRatios(double* const p_k)
68  {
69  // First solve the linear system for the alphas
70  updateAlphas();
71 
72  const int ns = m_collisions.nSpecies();
73  const int nh = m_collisions.nHeavy();
74  const int k = ns - nh;
75 
76  const ArrayXd& mi = m_collisions.mass();
77  const ArrayXd& nDij = m_collisions.nDij();
78  const ArrayXd& Cst = m_collisions.Cstij();
79 
80  // Compute heavy-particle thermal diffusion ratios
81  double fac;
82  m_sys.diagonal().setZero();
83  for (int j = 0, si = 1; j < nh; ++j, ++si) {
84  for (int i = j+1; i < nh; ++i, ++si) {
85  fac = m_x(i)*m_x(j)/(mi(i+k)+mi(j+k))*(1.2*Cst(si)-1.)/nDij(si);
86  m_sys(i,j) = fac*mi(i+k);
87  m_sys(j,i) = fac*mi(j+k);
88  m_sys(i,i) -= m_sys(j,i);
89  m_sys(j,j) -= m_sys(i,j);
90  }
91  }
92 
93  p_k[0] = 0.0;
94  Map<ArrayXd>(p_k+k,nh) = (m_sys*m_alpha)/KB;
95  }
96 
97 private:
98 
99  void updateAlphas()
100  {
101  const int ns = m_collisions.nSpecies();
102  const int nh = m_collisions.nHeavy();
103 
104  // Collision data
105  const ArrayXd& mi = m_collisions.mass();
106  const ArrayXd& Ast = m_collisions.Astij();
107  const ArrayXd& Bst = m_collisions.Bstij();
108  const ArrayXd& nDij = m_collisions.nDij();
109  const ArrayXd& etai = m_collisions.etai();
110 
111  // Compute the system matrix
112  double fac = 4.0 / (15.0 * KB);
113  int k = ns - nh, ik, jk;
114  m_x = Map<const ArrayXd>(m_collisions.thermo().X()+k,nh).max(1.0e-16);
115  m_sys.diagonal().array() = fac*m_x*m_x*mi.tail(nh)/etai;
116 
117  double miij;
118  double mjij;
119  for (int j = 0, index = 1; j < nh; ++j, ++index) {
120  jk = j+k;
121  for (int i = j+1; i < nh; ++i, ++index) {
122  ik = i+k;
123  miij = mi(ik) / (mi(ik) + mi(jk));
124  mjij = mi(jk) / (mi(ik) + mi(jk));
125  fac = m_x(i) * m_x(j) / (nDij(index) * 25.0 * KB);
126  m_sys(i,j) = fac * miij * mjij *
127  (16.0 * Ast(index) + 12.0 * Bst(index) - 55.0);
128  m_sys(i,i) += fac * (miij * (30.0 * miij + 16.0 * mjij *
129  Ast(index)) + mjij * mjij * (25.0 - 12.0 * Bst(index)));
130  m_sys(j,j) += fac * (mjij * (30.0 * mjij + 16.0 * miij *
131  Ast(index)) + miij * miij * (25.0 - 12.0 * Bst(index)));
132  }
133  }
134 
135  // Solve the linear system using the type of system solution given in
136  // template parameter
137  solver.compute(m_sys);
138  m_alpha = solver.solve(m_x.matrix());
139  }
140 
141 private:
142 
143  MatrixXd m_sys;
144  ArrayXd m_x;
145  VectorXd m_alpha;
146  Solver<MatrixXd, Lower> solver;
147 
148 }; // class ThermalConductivityChapmannEnskog
149 
150 // Register the Chapmann-Enskog solution using the LDLT decomposition
151 Config::ObjectProvider<
152  ThermalConductivityChapmannEnskog<Eigen::LDLT>, ThermalConductivityAlgorithm>
153  lambda_CE_LDLT("Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT");
154 
155 // Register the Chapmann-Enskog solution using the Conjugate-Gradient algorithm.
156 // Note the use of a proxy class CG to reduce the template arguments to 2
157 template <typename MatrixType, int UpLo>
158 class CG : public ConjugateGradient<MatrixType, UpLo> { };
159 Config::ObjectProvider<
160  ThermalConductivityChapmannEnskog<CG>, ThermalConductivityAlgorithm>
161  lambda_CE_CG("Chapmann-Enskog_CG");
162 
163  } // namespace Transport
164 } // namespace Mutation
